p: For Chikungunya fever, 42 out of 2,400 LISA changes were significant in 2015 and 19 out of 2,080 LISA changes were significant in 2016. In two years, the type of spatial diffusion was mixed because the number of changes related to the expansion and hierarchical diffusion were equal in 2015[21;21], and similar in 2016[10;19].
